item.title: MS14-068 privilege escalation PoC: 可以让任何域内用户提升为域管理员
item.description: ms14-068.py Exploits MS14-680 vulnerability on an un-patched domain controler of an Active Directory domain to get a Kerberos ticket for an existing domain user account with the privileges of the following domain groups : Domain Users (513) Domain Admins (512) Schema Admins (518) Enterprise Admins (519) Group Policy Creator Owners (520) USAGE: ms14-068.py -u <userName>@<domainName> -s <userSid> -d <domainControlerAddr> OPTIONS: -p <clearPassword> --rc4 <ntlmHash> Example usage : Linux (tested with
